issueContext.title: Add jsx-runtime.react-server.js to file allowlist
issueContext.body:
https://github.com/facebook/react/pull/28217 doesn't work without this since it's not included in the files list.

See https://github.com/dai-shi/waku/pull/467#issuecomment-1936965080.

This should fix that.

analysis.suggestedApproach: 1. **Type of Issue**: This appears to be a bug or a missing file issue related to the React project's build process or file distribution.
